Plot: An American inherits an apartment in Paris that comes with an unexpected resident.
Title: My Old Lady
Writer: Israel Horovitz (written for the screen by), Israel Horovitz (play)
Actors: Kevin Kline, Michael Burstin, Elie Wajeman, Maggie Smith
tomatoConsensus: Although My Old Lady doesn't quite live up to its stars' talents, Kevin Kline and Maggie Smith carry the film capably whenever they're together onscreen.
